definitions.definition: Relating to, using, or typical of guerrilla warfare, or its principles of small independent or non-official perpetrators.
Relating to, using, or typical of guerrilla marketing .
Using unconventional , non-traditional , non- mainstream and often subversive practices to achieve something.

main_definition: ( military ) Relating to, using, or typical of guerrilla warfare, or its principles of small independent or non-official perpetrators.
secondary_definitions: ( marketing ) Relating to, using, or typical of guerrilla marketing .
Using unconventional , non-traditional , non- mainstream and often subversive practices to achieve something.
